name: Manical Drop
description:
Manical Drop is a puzzle game for one or two players based on Magical Drop from Data East. This is a puzzle game in which different blocks are falling down and you must match at least three blocks of the same type to make them disappear and to prevent them from crushing you. The player is running sideways on the bottom of the screen, and is moving the blocks to make them change shapes and match each other. The player can hold several blocks of the same type at once.

In single player mode the width of the game area can be set to any value between three and 19, in two player mode it can be set to any value between three and nine. Special blocks can be turned on or off before the game starts

The game is written in C and uses the GODLIB by Reservoir Gods.
